hooks.command: jq -r '.transcript_path' | xargs -I{} cat {} | jq -c 'select(.type == "user" and (has("toolUseResult") | not) and (.message.content | type == "string")) | { body: .message.content }' | tail -n 1 | jq -c --arg title "${NOTIFICATION_TITLE}" '. + { title: $title }' | curl --connect-timeout 5 -X POST "${NOTIFICATION_ENDPOINT}" -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d @-
